### Petroleum, Oil and Lubricant (POL) Dispensing and Fuel Monitoring Systems Maintenance
#### Tender Identification
* Solicitation ID: WS4035796178
* Amendment: 1
* Notice ID: WS4035796178-DOC4035800397

#### Tender Notice
The Government of Canada is seeking competitive bids for the provision of Petroleum, Oil and Lubricant (POL) Dispensing Units Maintenance to the Department of National Defence at various locations of CFB Halifax and outlying areas.

#### Tender Overview
* Activity Name: Petroleum, Oil and Lubricant (POL) Dispensing and Fuel Monitoring Systems Maintenance
* Activity Classification: [Refuse disposal and treatment, Waste to fuel blending services, Petroleum products transport]
* Funding Source: Public Funds

#### Key Dates
* Publication Date: 2023-06-13
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-07-13T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-08-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-05-31

#### Contact Information
* Contracting Authority: Kate Mintzer (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: [kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone: [None]

#### Terms and Conditions
* Notice Type: Invitation to Bid
* Solicitation Method: Competitive Bidding
* Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: [list of applicable trade agreements]
* Regions of Opportunity: [list of applicable regions]
* End User Entities: [list of applicable end user entities]

#### Submission Requirements
* All bids must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority.

#### Inquiries
* All technical and contractual inquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority with a minimum of five (5) calendar days prior to the tender closing date.

#### Tender Description
Canada is seeking offers from qualified Offerors to provide routine maintenance for Petroleum, Oil and Lubricant (POL) Dispensing Units to the Department of National Defence at various locations of CFB Halifax and outlying areas. The contract period is for one (1) year with an option to proceed with four (4) additional one-year periods.
